name: January 2014 – August 2019
description: Youth Program Manager at the French Cultural Center/Alliance Française of Boston, Massachusetts, USA. Educational and cultural project management, quality control and training, marketing content creation for the Education Department. Achieved continuous year-over-year revenue growth (totaling US$2M in tuition for children and teens programs). Responsible for communication and engagement with parents and families. Direct supervisor for a team of 10 teachers, collaborative management of a team of 25. French foreign language and bilingual curricula development. Manager of “Accent on Success”, a community outreach program serving low-income Boston Public Schools.

name: August 2013 – December 2013
description: Teaching Assistant for graduate RETELL (Rethinking Equity in Teaching English Language Learners) Course 591SE, Genre-based pedagogy and Systemic Functional Linguistics. UMASS Amherst College of Education.

name: June 2013 – December 2013
description: Language Instructor at the International Language Institute, Northampton, MA. Intensive English Program (IEP) and World Languages Program.
